sentences.sContent: Conclusions Using HACCP method in refectory obtained good effect.
sentences.sContent_eng: Conclusions Using HACCP method in refectory obtained good effect.
sentences.sCn: 结论：在学校食堂应用HACCP管理是有效的。

sentences.sContent: Do you know if hereabout have preferable refectory for Western - style food.
sentences.sContent_eng: Do you know if hereabout have preferable refectory for Western - style food.
sentences.sCn: 你知道附近有比较好的西餐厅吗?。

sentences.sContent: There is no denying that the qualities of food in our refectory have gone from bad to worse .
sentences.sContent_eng: There is no denying that the qualities of food in our refectory have gone from bad to worse .
sentences.sCn: 不可否认的，我们学校食堂食物的质量已经每况愈下。

synos.tran: 食堂；（修道院，学院等处的）餐厅

remMethod.val: 来自refection(n. 食品， 小吃)

trans.tranOther: a large room in a school, college etc where meals are served and eaten
